pkgmetadata.longdescription: Imbalanced Resampling using SMOTE with Boosting (SMOTEWB) // Provides the SMOTE with Boosting (SMOTEWB) algorithm. See F. Salam, M. A. Cengiz (2022) doi:10.1016/j.eswa.2022.117023. Also SMOTEWB provides faster versions of several resampling methods for imbalanced datasets, including SMOTE with Boosting (SMOTEWB), ADASYN, Borderline SMOTE (BLSMOTE), Random Over- Sampling (ROS), Random Under-Sampling (RUS), Safe-Level SMOTE (SLSMOTE), Relocating Safe-Level SMOTE (RSLSMOTE), and Random Over-Sampling Examples (ROSE).
